English: What do you do for work?
Are you looking for something specific?
Can you show me the way?

Norwegian: Er det en lege i nærheten?
Kan du gi meg beskjed når...?
English: Can you let me know when...?

Norwegian: Hva synes du om dette stedet?
English: What do you think of this place?
What is the weather like today?
I would like to make a reservation

Norwegian: Kan du hjelpe meg å finne...?
Hva liker du å gjøre på fritiden?
English: What do you like to do in your free time?
What is the culture like here?

Norwegian: Jeg forstår ikke norsk så godt
English: I don't understand Norwegian very well

Norwegian: Hva anbefaler du å gjøre her?
English: What do you recommend doing here?

Norwegian: Kan jeg få en kopp kaffe?
English: Can I have a cup of coffee?
I would like to exchange this
How do I get back here?

Norwegian: Kan du vise meg veien til sykehuset?
English: Can you show me the way to the hospital?
I am looking forward to it

Norwegian: Hva har du lyst til å gjøre?
English: What would you like to do?
